data.text: @EU_Commission @ECDC_EU @EU_Health As a Vorarlbergese, uh oh
@EU_Commission You are going to force me to go from the 2 cables I have now to 3.  Thanks so much.
@EU_Commission This is a GREAT IDEA.....!

@EU_Commission @UKMisBrussels @PowerUSAID @antonioguterres @WFP @UNOCHA_ROSEA Deliberate deadly blockade & Siege set by🇪🇹n govern on #Tigray 200k+ children@ risk of Acute malnutrition, every day people dying of starvation how many more has to 4🌍leaders 2 Act. Act Now not 2morow.
@EU_Commission I doubt
@EU_Commission This is only because Apple has been wasteful and harmful to consumers for the last ten years. If they operated ethically, this law wouldn't need to be passed
@EU_Commission Luckely they did not standardize this 50 years ago. We would be stuck with rs-232 or Centronics plugs.

@EU_Commission I've been reusing the same rechargers for years. They all have a USB port and the only thing I need to change is the cable to connect to my device, IF it is a iPhone/iPad. Without lightning there would be no USBC. Beware of  too much red tape.
@EU_Commission Shouldn’t this read “on the future of the EU.”?
@EU_Commission The man made hunger in Tigray now, the Genocide in Tigray now will affect the Horn of Africa...extend to the flee of many to Europe.

@EU_Commission, how could you trust the #TPLFmisinformationCampaign and its foreign PR collaborators as your source of information? @UN @EU_Commission @Europarl_EN #UnityForEthiopia @UNSCouncil #BeFairUNSC @Refugees
@EU_Commission "Randomly chosen citizens discuss democracy "... What a pure bullshit.

@EU_Commission It takes several hours to send a confirmation password to people who want to participate and them only give 24h to activate it!
Only the unemployed can participate- students, older people,... They don't represent Europeans, but only a small fraction of us.
@EU_Commission World's top five terrorists of all time top to bottom are 1) CIA, 2) TPLF, 3) Al Qaeda,   4) ISIS,  5) Al Shebab.
@EU_Commission Could you please provide a link to the selection procedure? I'd be interested in specifics of the process.
@EU_Commission 👏👏👏
@EU_Commission Political theatre.
@EU_Commission 🤡🤡🤡🤡🤡🤡 randomly 🤡🤡🤡🤡🤡
@EU_Commission Will you share the selection criteria and process of this "random" selection or will this simply be another EU propaganda event?
@EU_Commission 👍🇻🇪
@EU_Commission Yes! Lead the way to less electronic waste…
@EU_Commission Democracy works😎.

@EU_Commission I call bullshit on the randomly. 
As for the constant propaganda from the EU. Only communist governments do this much. The EU has no mandate. The people do not want it. We need to stop the EU dictators.

@EU_Commission #china #ccpCancer #humanrights #taiwan #democracy #IndoPacific all good topics for discussion. Hopefully, the #eu doesn't just 'walk around with a pen and clipboard' like it usually does. #WakeUp
@EU_Commission The #EU had no future ! #NeXit

@EU_Commission USB-C is a nested socket, not a female socket unlike Lightning where both are reversible plugs developed or co-developed by @Apple - I wished.. Lightning was the new USB-C forward or something because @Europarl_EN is so late that they’re doing more harm than any good actually.
@EU_Commission Thats our biggest Problem in the EU!
@EU_Commission Please elaborate on how exactly this reduces electronic waste?

@EU_Commission I’m OK with standardising the actual charger, the thing that plugs in the wall, but can you please leave the connector on my devices alone?

A cable with the right plug to the charger and some standard in charging protocols is all that we really need.
@EU_Commission 👍
@EU_Commission This is most welcomed!
@EU_Commission While I think the idea itself is good, if you where really serious about reduing electroinc waste you would make right to repeair a reality. That would have a far greater effect.

@EU_Commission at least the EU Commission has now solved an issue that has long preoccupied some of us and is now keeping innovative technology as a standard for years to come. #buildproductspeoplelove
@EU_Commission Yea BIG problem that needs attention from EU - NOT!

@EU_Commission Nearly every new device uses USB-C already. Apple witch uses their lightning cable only in their iPhones. Fun fact: Apple had to invent lightning because regulations of the USB Organization. They were to slow to invent a charger with their needs.
Later Apple was copied with USB-C

@EU_Commission Das nenne ich mal #TechnikSozialismus oder wenn sich die Politik einmischt, wo sie die Finger von lassen sollte. Wenn ich einen Diesel und einen Benziner fahre, muss ich auch an 2 Zapfsäulen - MEIN BIER! Ach stimmt ja, das wird ja auch demnächst verschwinden.  „What the fuck“

@EU_Commission This will motivate Apple and subsequently others to do what they've been looking to do for years: Remove all ports and go full wireless. At which point we will loose charging efficiency and still have incompatible technologies creating waste. Unless you regulate that, too.

@EU_Commission This is European Comission but chooses standard which is in use by all asian manufacturers. I'd suggest to focus on real patologa which is spending EU money for asian stuff like police cars by KIA here in Poland.
@EU_Commission #FreePuigdemont

@EU_Commission Seeing Apple bootlickers talking about “stifling innovation”

Just a reminder that lightning cables
- transfer data at slow speeds
- currently can’t charge above 20W
- break more easily (in apple’s case)
- cost more 

Lightning does nothing but HURT the end user. NOT innovation
@EU_Commission No we haven’t got piles of phone chargers collecting in drawers. We just keep using the same iPhone chargers year after year.
@EU_Commission Creating economic hostages...
@EU_Commission @vonderleyen @JosepBorrellF UN+EU+WEF System world control.
@EU_Commission @EurobarometerEU Propaganda. Science and technology are double-edged swords...

@EU_Commission And this is what the EU is focussing on ? Really ? There are no more critical issues for you to consider? What a complete waste of time and money. Get a real job and do some good for the world.
@EU_Commission Leave Apple alone.
@EU_Commission
@EU_Commission Finally a voice of reason to simplify charging and set a standard. Hooray for the EU, if only the USA would have been first to initiate common sense.
@EU_Commission I agree with this plan

@EU_Commission @ThierryBreton @EU_Growth @DigitalEU @GospodinovaEU Pl include  all upto 200W must use usb C only

smart watches
Laptops
Toys
Trimmers

Etc etc

@EU_Commission usb-c is good... But what about computers? Uhh your forgetting of if both ends are USB-C how would we plug devices like microphones, cameras, and phones in our computers? Like not many computers have usb c ports.

@EU_Commission This is excellent news, can’t wait for this to be made the law. Its really annoying to be carrying a seperate charger and cable for the iPhone and another kit for all other devices. A common charger totally makes sense.
@EU_Commission @EurobarometerEU Zelenski calls on UN to "wake up" and intervene in conflict with Russia-backed separatists

@EU_Commission Honestly as convenient as it would be, thats taking away someone's right to be different. You should have no right to tell people what they can or cannot do. If people want iphones let them buy them knowing that apple makes iphones the way they want to.
@EU_Commission perfect good idea cyber users 📱
@EU_Commission @EurobarometerEU What reason could there be for Europeans not to support science and technology? This is very weird statement.
@EU_Commission @MKBHD

@EU_Commission 
FREE @KRLS

@EU_Commission the MEP Puigdemont has been kidnapped. Spain is not respecting the European law, lying to the European Court of Justice. The #NextGenerationEU funds should not be transferred to corrupt Spain.
#FreePuigdemont

@EU_Commission 100 cables made are still using up 100 cables worth of materials. 100 cables thrown away will take up 100 cables worth of space. Doesn't matter if its 50 lightning cables and 50 USB C cables, or 100 of either or. You're still producing and throwing away the same amount of cables.

@EU_Commission No - it's only a couple of different cables -  the chargers themselves are already standard - it's only the idiot manufacturers that mould charger and cable all in to one that is the issue
@EU_Commission También debería de existir un solo tipo de contacto de luz.

@EU_Commission The perfect example of how idiotic the EU actually are. Do you have nothing better to focus on? Talk about lack of priorities! Lack of an effective immigration policy. Lack of a policy of energy safety. It’s embarrassing and you are the laughing stock in the world!

@EU_Commission The issue is French softness on China. After HK, there is no reason to be optimistic. Xi was elected as head of the State on the promise of taking control of Taiwan. So stop being a French jackass.

@EU_Commission This is addressing a problem that doesn’t exist and hasn’t existed for some time maybe 10 years ago. These days everything except iPhones are USB-C and has been for a while. The only people collecting old cords have a hoarding problem.
@EU_Commission Actual fascism.  Make no mistake about it.
@EU_Commission You have actually spent time.discussing this rubbish.

@EU_Commission What a great result after 16 years of debate and wasting billions of tax money for this. So with great confidence I'll be looking forward to the building of an EU army and their great achievements to come.
@EU_Commission This is awesome! Hopefully this proposal helps spill over into the US and other countries too!

@EU_Commission @ThierryBreton @EU_Growth @DigitalEU @GospodinovaEU Stop trying to ruin Apple and stop trying to take over technology, Apple And other companies should be able to use whatever charger they want proprietary or not
@EU_Commission That is the first sensible law the EU has come up with in ages.
@EU_Commission Great! THX!
@EU_Commission I don't see chargers, only cables. Chargers commonly have USB outlet. Cables oneside USB plug
@EU_Commission Think you better take care of a EU standard for electrical wall outlets 230Volts, instead try control a soon obsolete way of charging #wireless #USBC USB-C
@EU_Commission Given the perceived advantages of the USB-C protocol over lightning, isn't this proposed directive promoting innovation, not stifling as Apple implies?
@EU_Commission Hope apple will understand it 🙂

@EU_Commission This is unbelievably backwards. So forcing Apple to stop using lightning, and causing us to throw out all our existing lightning cables…reduces E waste? Please explain. And then what? We’re stuck with USB C for the next how many decades, because innovation is now illegal?

@EU_Commission I fail to see the issue here. Most "cables" have already been standardised before. And it was done by market forces. Interfering with this may hamper future innovation as regulations may impact further development of electronics. As such I don't think it is wise to meddle in this
@EU_Commission This is one of the main reasons I haven't gone back to an iphone!
@EU_Commission Finally @EU_Commission. There is one powerful authority that can force Apple to use USB Type C and that's you. No more different sockets please. USB-C needs to be universal.
@EU_Commission I have always said if you have an Apple product you cn only have Apples , if you have an Android Product you have the whole Orchard
@EU_Commission Let’s stop Faroe Islands barbarians kill so many sea species …. How much tolerance on those murders ?

@EU_Commission Won’t this just be *awesome* when the standards you legislate today become obsolete tomorrow. Micro-USB, anyone? 🤦🏻‍♂️ 

If you really need a problem to solve, start with European mains power receptacle standards. 😂
@EU_Commission That's great news! 👍👍👍
@EU_Commission No. We want the Freedom to Choose as consumers which cable is best for our needs, not you. #EndChargerChaos
@EU_Commission USA should do likewise!
@EU_Commission Yes! Anything to make apple standardize. Great work making Tesla interoperable with other vehicle charging too.
@EU_Commission And how fast will you be able to adapt those rules when USB-C is no longer the industry standard? Who can innovate now to create a smaller and better connector in the future?

@EU_Commission Will this apply to laptops? Please.
I have 5, each is unique.

@EU_Commission and @StateDept say to the Ethiopian gov ‘There can be no military solution to this conflict.’ Well, how do you stop a terrorist that kills, displaces, and loots? The saying so far only emboldened #TPLFTerroristGroup! #TPLFSURRENDERNOW 4 PEACE! #UnityForEthiopia
@EU_Commission Better introduce a standard cartridge for printers.
@EU_Commission Finally a good decision

@EU_Commission #nope
